name: The Offer (adamninja)
description:
Downloaded version is recommended for a smoother and more stable experience

**DO NOT USE THE IN-GAME FULLSCREEN MODE in WEBGL** (it'll bug the resolution)

You've taken a new job offer to work on a small island. After arriving and following the trail of your recruiter, something seems very off.

Features:

  • A story told through audio and visual narration
  • Beautiful low-poly landscapes that slightly change as the game progresses
  • Roughly 30 minutes from start to end
  • No water noise when you walk through water! (haha working on it)

This is the first released version of the game. It currently only has one ending(ok technically 2), though I plan to add additional endings and challenges if there's enough demand.  Thanks for looking/playing!

Content Warning: this game contains descriptions of gore and discussions of adult content.

Follow me on Twitter for more game projects in the works! https://twitter.com/adamninja9

Note: If you're playing in WebGL/Browser, and find yourself with a journal stuck on your screen, press the Tab key to close it. The text is kind of small for webgl. I previously had it set to ESC, but changed it to avoid exiting out of the game :)
